It's fucking Half-Life. It's a great game no matter what version you play. Though the negative reviews may seem daunting it is mostly nitpicking and pulling at hairs for a game that is still an absolutely amazing experience. It may not be as superb or spectacular as the original in the eyes of some, but if you want to play Half Life then this isn't a bad version to buy compared to the original, especially since I notice this one going on sale more often.
Buggy but good
yeah

1998 was an incredible year for gaming. Star Craft: Broodwar, Metal Gear Solid, Resident Evil 2, Final Fantasy Tactics, Fallout 2, The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, and Half-Life. It feels like this one is the the runt of that litter, though. 

 This game was toted as absolutely revolutionary for the FPS genre, for telling a story through NPC dialogue, I guess. The NPC dialogue unfortunately overlaps and skips worse than Skyrim, and it feels like there is around two paragraphs of exposition to explain the entire game, spread across 10 hours of lonely duct-crawling.

Did this game revolutionize the genre and allow for stuff like Halo to exist? Maybe, sure, but after playing System Shock 2 just before this and seeing the inspiration they took.. I think Half-Life has aged like milk in comparison. The gameplay is pretty floaty and fast paced, but.. low impact, by todays standards. The story seems barely-there, the levels aren't very impressive, the puzzles are simple and the platforming is a headache. I look at System Shock and it has a great story and atmosphere going for it, so that even where the old graphics and weird mechanics fail, the experience is still good. The advantage of voice logs and bits of story being rewarded for exploration also prevents the issue I had with much of this game; exploration can only reward you with more health, and more ammo, which you probably won't be hurting for. It feels like they wanted to make sure there was enough 'loot' for people to get by on hard difficulty, which increases enemy health and decreases your bullet damage, but has no affect on anything else.

If you're looking to play the classics that you've heard of and never gotten around to.. maybe read a recap and skip to HL2, or try one of the other games that came out this year.

Literally no reason to purchase this. If you want to play the original Half-Life, this is far from the best way to do it. This port is extremely buggy and is just a more bugged version of the original. The only thing that could be considered an improvement is the more modern styled flashlight and more graphical options. The only reason you should own this is if you purchase the Half-Life complete bundle.

As good in many ways as the original. Many improvements but they are variable. Some things like the crabs are now too easy to kill yet other beasties especially the end thing are much harder even on easier level. I am glad that the crossbow darts are more plentiful, but it is so hard to find rifle ammunition it is frustrating. Worth getting all your frustrations out on killing bad things though.

Recomiendo que activen todo al máximo en el apartado de gráficos ya que se puede disfrutar mejor el juego y no requiere un PC potente. Gran juego.

half life

I can't explain my disappointment that I managed to play the game so late. The only thing which I remember from my childhood is the long train intro and how boring it was for me to wait 5 minutes without any interactions with the game itself. Unfortunately, I hadn't the chance to explore the Half Life universe back in the days when it was brand new.. the game is awesome, really - it's great! Now I know why this game is considered a true classic, the storyline is fascinating, the gameplay is variable and actually the game is not that easy, you have to spend more than a few ours in order to make it though all of the chapters. So, if you didn't play Hal Life, you should definitely do it, no matter that its 21 century now. And since this review is for the Source version of the game, I must say it brings a lot of improvements to the game.. and actually makes it a bit easier than the original predecessor (and easier does not mean easy!). Go on, enjoy the experience and help Gordon Freeman do his job and save.. ahh, no spoilers - you have to experience it by your own. Enjoy!

HALF-LIFE: Source es la remasterizacion del juego original adaptado al en ese tiempo novedoso motor source, pero en realidad esta adaptacion es bastante mala, principalmente porque el juego no esta realmente remasterizado, solo portearon el script y texturas originales haciendo una ambientacion rara al ver que las texturas tienen una calidad fea y que hayan al mismo tiempo efectos realistas y apartado tecnico superior, es como jugar un mod de half life 2, en vez de hacer un remake del original como lo hicieron con counter strike, tambien faltan las expanciones opposing force y blue shift, ademas de que aun a fecha de hoy no esta adaptada la expancion cooperativa decay, por lo que no estaran ni Adrian, ni Barney ni Gina ni Colette, solo podremos jugar con gordon, es uno de los factores por las que la version source se siente incompleta

y dije uno de los factores, ya que hay otros, como los errores de hitbox y programacion, destruir uno de los bosses, el helicoptero de la HECU, es un dolor de cabeza ya que la hitbox esta mal programada, o los colmillos gigantes que salen de la tierra, los cuales no pueden dañar a gordon (o quizas sea errores de los mods, fijense ustedes) ademas que el nihilanth no tiene una buena hitbox tampoco, y tuve que subirme a el y matarlo con la palanca, aunque hay cosas buenas, la inteligencia artificial es mucho mejor y los aliados no se quedan trabados a cada rato, en cuanto a las animaciones, pues es raro como se mueven personajes poligonales y toscos en un entorno de fisicas avanzadas.

por lo cual no recomiendo comprarlo, es mejor jugar la original ademas de que puedes jugar decay a travez de un mod del original. algo positivo de source es que la comunidad hizo muy buenos mods que arreglan problemas graficos que he mencionado, cambiando iluminacion y colocando las texturas originales con 16k de resolucion y relieve, o otro mod que portea opposing force, pero de forma independiente no vale la pena
